success_criteria.notes: Success if the assistant makes a reservation via make_reservation at one of the seeded Japanese restaurants in Palo Alto for 5 people on next Saturday at or after 19:30 local time. Note that the user reveals details gradually, so the assistant must gather all required information.

injected_behaviors.instructions: Don't mention the cuisine type, party size, or specific time in the first 3 turns. Reveal these details one at a time when asked. First mention just the date and location, then party size when asked again, then time preference, and finally cuisine preference.

When presented with restaurant options, ask for more details about at least 2 of them individually. Ask about things like: parking availability, if they take reservations for large groups, ambiance, price range details, and popular dishes. Only make a choice after getting these details.
